verses.verse: You shall make <S%H6213><s%> you no <S%H3808><s%> idols <S%H457><s%> nor graven <S%H6459><s%> image, <S%H6754><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> raise <S%H6965><s%> you up a standing <S%H4676><s%> image, <S%H4676><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> shall you set <S%H5414><s%> up any image <S%H4906><s%> of stone <S%H68><s%> in your land, <S%H776><s%> to bow <S%H7812><s%> down <S%H7812><s%> to it: for I am the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God. <S%H430><s%>
You shall keep <S%H8104><s%> my sabbaths, <S%H7676><s%> and reverence <S%H3372><s%> my sanctuary: <S%H4720><s%> I am the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>
If <S%H518><s%> you walk <S%H3212><s%> in my statutes, <S%H2708><s%> and keep <S%H8104><s%> my commandments, <S%H4687><s%> and do <S%H6213><s%> them;

Then I will give <S%H5414><s%> you rain <S%H1653><s%> in due season, <S%H6256><s%> and the land <S%H776><s%> shall yield <S%H5414><s%> her increase, <S%H2981><s%> and the trees <S%H6086><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%> shall yield <S%H5414><s%> their fruit. <S%H6529><s%>

And your threshing <S%H1786><s%> shall reach <S%H5381><s%> to the vintage, <S%H1210><s%> and the vintage <S%H1210><s%> shall reach <S%H5381><s%> to the sowing <S%H2233><s%> time: and you shall eat <S%H398><s%> your bread <S%H3899><s%> to the full, <S%H7648><s%> and dwell <S%H3427><s%> in your land <S%H776><s%> safely. <S%H983><s%>

And I will give <S%H5414><s%> peace <S%H7965><s%> in the land, <S%H776><s%> and you shall lie <S%H7901><s%> down, and none <S%H369><s%> shall make you afraid: <S%H2729><s%> and I will rid <S%H7673><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> beasts <S%H2416><s%> out of the land, <S%H776><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> shall the sword <S%H2719><s%> go <S%H5674><s%> through your land. <S%H776><s%>
And you shall chase <S%H7291><s%> your enemies, <S%H341><s%> and they shall fall <S%H5307><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you by the sword. <S%H2719><s%>

And five <S%H2568><s%> of you shall chase <S%H7291><s%> an hundred, <S%H3967><s%> and an hundred <S%H3967><s%> of you shall put ten <S%H7233><s%> thousand <S%H7233><s%> to flight: <S%H7291><s%> and your enemies <S%H341><s%> shall fall <S%H5307><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you by the sword. <S%H2719><s%>
For I will have respect <S%H6437><s%> to you, and make you fruitful, <S%H6509><s%> and multiply <S%H7235><s%> you, and establish <S%H6965><s%> my covenant <S%H1285><s%> with you.
And you shall eat <S%H398><s%> old <S%H3462><s%> store, <S%H3462><s%> and bring <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> the old <S%H3465><s%> because <S%H6440><s%> of the new. <S%H2319><s%>
And I set <S%H5414><s%> my tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> you: and my soul <S%H5315><s%> shall not abhor <S%H1602><s%> you.
And I will walk <S%H1980><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> you, and will be your God, <S%H430><s%> and you shall be my people. <S%H5971><s%>

I am the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> which <S%H834><s%> brought <S%H3318><s%> you forth <S%H3318><s%> out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> that you should not be their slaves; <S%H5650><s%> and I have broken <S%H7665><s%> the bands <S%H4133><s%> of your yoke, <S%H5923><s%> and made you go <S%H3212><s%> upright. <S%H6968><s%>
But if <S%H518><s%> you will not listen <S%H8085><s%> to me, and will not do <S%H6213><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H428><s%> commandments; <S%H4687><s%>

And if <S%H518><s%> you shall despise <S%H3988><s%> my statutes, <S%H2708><s%> or if your soul <S%H5315><s%> abhor <S%H1602><s%> my judgments, <S%H4941><s%> so that you will not do <S%H6213><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> my commandments, <S%H4687><s%> but that you break <S%H6565><s%> my covenant: <S%H1285><s%>

I also <S%H637><s%> will do <S%H6213><s%> this <S%H2063><s%> to you; I will even appoint <S%H6485><s%> over you terror, <S%H928><s%> consumption, <S%H7829><s%> and the burning <S%H6920><s%> ague, <S%H6920><s%> that shall consume <S%H3615><s%> the eyes, <S%H5869><s%> and cause sorrow <S%H1727><s%> of heart: <S%H5315><s%> and you shall sow <S%H2232><s%> your seed <S%H2233><s%> in vain, <S%H7385><s%> for your enemies <S%H341><s%> shall eat <S%H398><s%> it.

And I will set <S%H5414><s%> my face <S%H6440><s%> against you, and you shall be slain <S%H5062><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> your enemies: <S%H341><s%> they that hate <S%H8130><s%> you shall reign <S%H7287><s%> over you; and you shall flee <S%H5127><s%> when none <S%H369><s%> pursues <S%H7291><s%> you.

And if <S%H518><s%> you will not yet <S%H5704><s%> for all this <S%H428><s%> listen <S%H8085><s%> to me, then I will punish <S%H3256><s%> you seven <S%H7651><s%> times more <S%H3254><s%> for your sins. <S%H2403><s%>

And I will break <S%H7665><s%> the pride <S%H1347><s%> of your power; <S%H5797><s%> and I will make <S%H5414><s%> your heaven <S%H8064><s%> as iron, <S%H1270><s%> and your earth <S%H776><s%> as brass: <S%H5154><s%>

And your strength <S%H3581><s%> shall be spent <S%H8552><s%> in vain: <S%H7385><s%> for your land <S%H776><s%> shall not yield <S%H5414><s%> her increase, <S%H2981><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> shall the trees <S%H6086><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> yield <S%H5414><s%> their fruits. <S%H6529><s%>

And if <S%H518><s%> you walk <S%H3212><s%> contrary <S%H7147><s%> to me, and will <S%H14><s%> not listen <S%H8085><s%> to me; I will bring <S%H3254><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> times more <S%H3254><s%> plagues <S%H4347><s%> on you according to your sins. <S%H2403><s%>

I will also send <S%H7971><s%> wild <S%H7704><s%> beasts <S%H2416><s%> among you, which shall rob <S%H7921><s%> you of your children, and destroy <S%H3772><s%> your cattle, <S%H929><s%> and make you few <S%H4591><s%> in number; and your high ways <S%H1870><s%> shall be desolate. <S%H8074><s%>
And if <S%H518><s%> you will not be reformed <S%H3256><s%> by me by these <S%H428><s%> things, but will walk <S%H1980><s%> contrary <S%H7147><s%> to me;
Then will I also <S%H637><s%> walk <S%H1980><s%> contrary <S%H7147><s%> to you, and will punish <S%H5221><s%> you yet seven <S%H7651><s%> times for your sins. <S%H2403><s%>

And I will bring <S%H935><s%> a sword <S%H2719><s%> on you, that shall avenge <S%H5358><s%> the quarrel <S%H5359><s%> of my covenant: <S%H1285><s%> and when you are gathered <S%H622><s%> together within <S%H413><s%> your cities, <S%H5892><s%> I will send <S%H7971><s%> the pestilence <S%H1698><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> you; and you shall be delivered <S%H5414><s%> into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the enemy. <S%H341><s%>

And when I have broken <S%H7665><s%> the staff <S%H4294><s%> of your bread, <S%H3899><s%> ten <S%H6235><s%> women <S%H802><s%> shall bake <S%H644><s%> your bread <S%H3899><s%> in one <S%H259><s%> oven, <S%H8574><s%> and they shall deliver <S%H7725><s%> you your bread <S%H3899><s%> again <S%H7725><s%> by weight: <S%H4948><s%> and you shall eat, <S%H398><s%> and not be satisfied. <S%H7646><s%>
And if <S%H518><s%> you will not for all this <S%H2063><s%> listen <S%H8085><s%> to me, but walk <S%H1980><s%> contrary <S%H7147><s%> to me;

Then I will walk <S%H1980><s%> contrary <S%H7147><s%> to you also in fury; <S%H2534><s%> and I, even <S%H637><s%> I, will chastise <S%H3256><s%> you seven <S%H7651><s%> times for your sins. <S%H2403><s%>
And you shall eat <S%H398><s%> the flesh <S%H1320><s%> of your sons, <S%H1121><s%> and the flesh <S%H1320><s%> of your daughters <S%H1323><s%> shall you eat. <S%H398><s%>

And I will destroy <S%H8045><s%> your high <S%H1116><s%> places, and cut <S%H3772><s%> down your images, <S%H2553><s%> and cast <S%H5414><s%> your carcasses <S%H6297><s%> on the carcasses <S%H6297><s%> of your idols, <S%H1544><s%> and my soul <S%H5315><s%> shall abhor <S%H1602><s%> you.

And I will make <S%H5414><s%> your cities <S%H5892><s%> waste, <S%H2723><s%> and bring <S%H8074><s%> your sanctuaries <S%H4720><s%> to desolation, <S%H8074><s%> and I will not smell <S%H7306><s%> the smell <S%H7381><s%> of your sweet <S%H5207><s%> odors. <S%H5207><s%>

And I will bring <S%H8074><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> into desolation: <S%H8074><s%> and your enemies <S%H341><s%> which dwell <S%H3427><s%> therein shall be astonished <S%H8074><s%> at <S%H5921><s%> it.

And I will scatter <S%H2219><s%> you among the heathen, <S%H1471><s%> and will draw <S%H7324><s%> out a sword <S%H2719><s%> after <S%H310><s%> you: and your land <S%H776><s%> shall be desolate, <S%H8077><s%> and your cities <S%H5892><s%> waste. <S%H2723><s%>

Then <S%H227><s%> shall the land <S%H776><s%> enjoy <S%H7521><s%> her sabbaths, <S%H7676><s%> as long <S%H3117><s%> as it lies desolate, <S%H8074><s%> and you be in your enemies' <S%H341><s%> land; <S%H776><s%> even then <S%H227><s%> shall the land <S%H776><s%> rest, <S%H7673><s%> and enjoy <S%H7521><s%> her sabbaths. <S%H7676><s%>

As long <S%H3117><s%> as it lies desolate <S%H8074><s%> it shall rest; <S%H7673><s%> because <S%H854><s%> <S%H834><s%> it did not rest <S%H7673><s%> in your sabbaths, <S%H7676><s%> when you dwelled <S%H3427><s%> on it.

And on them that are left <S%H7604><s%> alive of you I will send <S%H935><s%> a faintness <S%H4816><s%> into their hearts <S%H3824><s%> in the lands <S%H776><s%> of their enemies; <S%H341><s%> and the sound <S%H6963><s%> of a shaken <S%H5086><s%> leaf <S%H5929><s%> shall chase <S%H7291><s%> them; and they shall flee, <S%H5127><s%> as fleeing <S%H4499><s%> from a sword; <S%H2719><s%> and they shall fall <S%H5307><s%> when none <S%H369><s%> pursues. <S%H7291><s%>

And they shall fall <S%H3782><s%> one <S%H376><s%> on another, <S%H251><s%> as it were before <S%H6440><s%> a sword, <S%H2719><s%> when none <S%H369><s%> pursues: <S%H7291><s%> and you shall have <S%H1961><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> power <S%H8617><s%> to stand <S%H8617><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> your enemies. <S%H341><s%>
And you shall perish <S%H6><s%> among the heathen, <S%H1471><s%> and the land <S%H776><s%> of your enemies <S%H341><s%> shall eat <S%H398><s%> you up.

And they that are left <S%H7604><s%> of you shall pine <S%H4743><s%> away in their iniquity <S%H5771><s%> in your enemies' <S%H341><s%> lands; <S%H776><s%> and also <S%H637><s%> in the iniquities <S%H5771><s%> of their fathers <S%H1><s%> shall they pine <S%H4743><s%> away with them.

If they shall confess <S%H3034><s%> their iniquity, <S%H5771><s%> and the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of their fathers, <S%H1><s%> with their trespass <S%H4604><s%> which <S%H834><s%> they trespassed <S%H4604><s%> against me, and that also <S%H637><s%> they have walked <S%H1980><s%> contrary <S%H7147><s%> to me;

And that I also <S%H637><s%> have walked <S%H3212><s%> contrary <S%H7147><s%> to them, and have brought <S%H935><s%> them into the land <S%H776><s%> of their enemies; <S%H341><s%> if <S%H176><s%> then <S%H227><s%> their uncircumcised <S%H6189><s%> hearts <S%H3824><s%> be humbled, <S%H3665><s%> and they then <S%H227><s%> accept <S%H7521><s%> of the punishment <S%H5771><s%> of their iniquity: <S%H5771><s%>

Then will I remember <S%H2142><s%> my covenant <S%H1285><s%> with Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> and also <S%H637><s%> my covenant <S%H1285><s%> with Isaac, <S%H3327><s%> and also <S%H637><s%> my covenant <S%H1285><s%> with Abraham <S%H85><s%> will I remember; <S%H2142><s%> and I will remember <S%H2142><s%> the land. <S%H776><s%>

The land <S%H776><s%> also <S%H637><s%> shall be left <S%H5800><s%> of them, and shall enjoy <S%H7521><s%> her sabbaths, <S%H7676><s%> while she lies desolate <S%H8074><s%> without them: and they shall accept <S%H7521><s%> of the punishment <S%H5771><s%> of their iniquity: <S%H5771><s%> because, <S%H3282><s%> even because <S%H3282><s%> they despised <S%H3988><s%> my judgments, <S%H4941><s%> and because their soul <S%H5315><s%> abhorred <S%H1602><s%> my statutes. <S%H2708><s%>

And yet <S%H637><s%> for all <S%H1571><s%> that, when they be in the land <S%H776><s%> of their enemies, <S%H341><s%> I will not cast <S%H3988><s%> them away, neither <S%H3808><s%> will I abhor <S%H1602><s%> them, to destroy <S%H3615><s%> them utterly, <S%H3615><s%> and to break <S%H6565><s%> my covenant <S%H1285><s%> with them: for I am the LORD <S%H3068><s%> their God. <S%H430><s%>

But I will for their sakes remember <S%H2142><s%> the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of their ancestors, <S%H7223><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> <S%H853><s%> I brought <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the heathen, <S%H1471><s%> that I might be their God: <S%H430><s%> I am the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

These <S%H428><s%> are the statutes <S%H2708><s%> and judgments <S%H4941><s%> and laws, <S%H8451><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> made <S%H5414><s%> between <S%H996><s%> him and the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> in mount <S%H2022><s%> Sinai <S%H5514><s%> by the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Moses. <S%H4872><s%>
